summary:
Amina is waiting for you!
She\'s essential.
descriptionHtml:
Amina is Rayya\'s sister but she dosesn\'t want to stay with her at the Jarl Longhouse.
She\'s wainting for you at The Dead Mans Drink (Falkreath).

Competences : 2 handed, destruction, light armor
 
(sorry if my english isn\'t very good) 

*** MOD REQUIRES ***

Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only (by Radioragae) - Oblivionhairs 04
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110#content

--- TO LOOK LIKE AMINA --- (not an obligation)

univision Face (by DD AKT)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569
author: Fonkyb
